import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Task } from '../models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todolist', templateUrl: './todolist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todolist.component.css'] }) export class TodolistComponent { tasksArray : Task[] = [] removeTask(i: number) { this.tasksArray.removeAt } }
